org.fax4j.util

Class ConnectionImpl<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fax4j.util.AbstractCloseable
      • org.fax4j.util.ConnectionImpl<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The resource type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Connection<T>

    public class ConnectionImpl<T>
extends AbstractCloseable
implements Connection<T>
    This class provides the basic common connection implementation.

    0.39a
